headline: Jack Daniel’s Maker Brown-Forman Forecasts Organic-Sales Decline
summary: Jack Daniel’s maker Brown-Forman expects organic sales to decline this fiscal year as consumer demand softens in the face of shifting tariffs and uncertainty about the U.S. economy.

raw.headline: Jack Daniel’s Maker Brown-Forman Forecasts Organic-Sales Decline
raw.summary: Jack Daniel’s maker Brown-Forman expects organic sales to decline this fiscal year as consumer demand softens in the face of shifting tariffs and uncertainty about the U.S. economy.

headline: Analyst Says Trump Tariffs are Here to Stay and Recommends This ‘Neglected’ Cheap Stock
summary: Bill Stone, Glenview Trust Company chief investment officer, recently said while talking to CNBC that he believes tariffs are here to stay and investors should focus on stocks that have been “neglected” or “overlooked” so far. Constellation Brands Inc (NYSE:STZ) is one of the stocks Stone is recommending: “One is Constellation Brands. The good news […]

headline: Brown-Forman B (BF.B) Lags Q4 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: Brown-Forman B (BF.B) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of -13.89% and 8.10%, respectively, for the quarter ended April 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?
